domain.name: Person

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes You golfed in February multiple times & did a rally in South Carolina on February 28th where you said the Coronavirus was a hoax the Democrats were using against you?  Most Americans are staying at home.  Sorry you haven’t taken a vacation in 6 wks. It must be awful.  #Trumpvirus
